document.full_text: yoko nishikawa joined reuters tokyo bureau 13 years ago, covering economic policy, politics and general news. she moved to the asia editing desk in singapore at the end of last year.  in the following story she tells of her experience on returning to her homeland to cover the aftermath of the march 11 earthquake and tsunami.
document.title: witness: japan tsunami survivors at loss to restore life
